column1: in memory of freda j slocum -- weldon funeral home| first: last: born: october 24
column3: 2015. this memorial provided by:weldon funeral home. penn yan
column6: 2015 send card. freda jane slocum 80 of penn yan passed away on wednesday june 17th at soldiers & sailors hospital. calling hours will be held on wednesday june 24th from 12 - 2 pm with services at 2 pm memorial donations may be made to the office for the aging.
